programme.title: Assassinos do Espao, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em um dia normal, cinco amigos saem para beber noite, mas, coisas estranhas comeam a acontecer. As luzes apagam, os telefones no funcionam e uma invaso de naves aliengenas escurece o cu.

programme.title: Os Suspeitos, (1995, Thriller)

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Fresh, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Disenchanted by the harsh realities of life in the city, a smart, streetwise kid named Fresh strives to create a better future for himself and his family. He defies the odds by staying one move ahead of the criminals in a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man whos never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Top Secret!, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: Top Secret! pits American rock star Nick Rivers against the dreaded East German High Command. It's a race against time as Nick teams up with Hillary Flammond to find her father.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Envy, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau portray lifelong feuding neighbors making each day a hilarious game of revenge. But then voluptuous Ariel moves in nearby and their dormant hormones reignite in an all-out competition to win her favor.

programme.title: Grumpier Old Men, (1995, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to Grumpy Old Men, a vivacious Italian beauty attempts to convert Wabasha, Minnesota's cherished bait store into a romantic Italian restaurant.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Young Guns II, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: The West has changed since The Regulators last rode through. Cornered by the ruthless cattle kings and double-crossed by corrupt government officials, Billy the Kid leads the Regulators down a treacherous trail towards Old Mexico and destiny.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy, (1969, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This Academy Award-winning Best Picture stars Dustin Hoffman and Jon Voight in standout, Oscar-nominated performances as a con man and a Texas hustler trying to survive on the tough streets of New York. The legendary John Schlesinger directs.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Friday Foster, (1975, Blaxploitation)
programme.desc: No sooner has photojournalist Friday Foster (Pam Grier) been warned that her personal involvement in stories will not end happily, than she witnesses the attempted assassination of a prominent African-American figure. Now Friday is a target!

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: As a result of a new medical technique, an agent is able to surgically take on the identical appearance of a criminal in order to take down his terrorist organization.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: The Strawberry Roan, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Genes first color film stars Champion in the title role as a wild outlaw stallion, branded a killer, and the two-fisted cowboy who fights off a gun-crazed posse to win justice for the noble animal.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Texas Rangers and long-time ranching partners Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call meet their old friend Jake, and decide to strike out from their south Texas base and drive a cattle herd to Montana.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: McCrae and Wood's cattle drive faces deadly situations. Sheriff July Johnson heads to Texas, and former prostitute Lorena is abandoned by Jake and kidnapped by the psychotic Blue Duck.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part II - On The Trail

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Ritchie.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett (The Black Dahlia, Pearl Harbor) crosses over to the dark side in this bone-chilling adaptation of the cult-hit graphic novel, brought to the screen in all its demonic glory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmuschs ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.

programme.desc: Hotarus and Mistress 9s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotarus heart.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tigers Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawks Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamorus friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.
programme.sub-title: Makoto's Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
programme.sub-title: Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy's Invitation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
programme.sub-title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
programme.sub-title: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usuis new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fishs Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguardespecially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fishs Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they dont capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.

programme.desc: Rei becomes famous after posing for a magazine. A girl named Nanako, expresses her desire to study under Rei so that she can become just like her.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usas school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ray Breslin and his team of security experts fight to rescue Breslin's girlfriend and a tech mogul's daughter from a formidable prison known as Devil's Station.

programme.title: The Last Stand, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Escape Plan, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An expert (Sylvester Stallone) in prison security joins forces with an inmate (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to break out of a top-secret, high-tech facility.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Security specialist Ray Breslin assembles an elite team to help him track down his trusted operative, Shu Ren, who has disappeared inside the most elaborate prison ever built.

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ray Breslin and his team of security experts fight to rescue Breslin's girlfriend and a tech mogul's daughter from a formidable prison known as Devil's Station.

programme.title: The Last Stand, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A sheriff must take matters into his own hands when a notorious drug lord escapes from FBI custody and comes speeding toward a showdown in the lawman's quiet border town.

programme.title: King of Thieves, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When a vindictive bandit threatens the peace of a flourishing kingdom, the native mystical and worldly forces must come together to save the day.

programme.title: Den of Thieves, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An elite unit of the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department squares off against a crew of ex-military men who hatch an elaborate plan for a seemingly impossible heist -- the city's Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Empire State, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A security guard (Liam Hemsworth) and his childhood pal (Michael Angarano) make plans to rob an armored car.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Hailed as a landmark film that dazzles with deep emotion and exceptional acting, PHILADELPHIA stars Tom Hanks and Denzel Washington as two competing lawyers who join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Inferno, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) follows a trail of clues across Europe with Sienna Brooks (Felicity Jones) to stop a virus that would wipe out half the worlds population.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Steins;Gate
programme.desc: Okabe and Makise find themselves faced with the unthinkable situation of saying goodbye before their time together really even began, and struggle to admit their true feelings before it's too late.

programme.title: Steins;Gate
programme.desc: In a completely unexpected turn of events, a face from the past returns to the present with a working time machine and a mission for Okabe to prevent WWIII.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Wasabi
programme.desc: Um duro detetive francs, chamado ao Japo para o funeral da esposa que o deixou h muito tempo atrs, descobre que tem uma filha adolescente cuja vida corre perigo, estando na mira da Yakuza.

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal
programme.desc: O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia.

programme.title: A Vinganca Minha
programme.desc: Aps o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho atravs da fronteira para Vancouver.

programme.title: Vice: A Mquina
programme.desc: Julian Michaels um consagrado designer cuja obra maior Vice, um resort onde as pessoas podem fazer absolutamente tudo o que desejar, sem se ater a leis ou regras, j que apenas convive com robs travestidos de humanos.

programme.title: A Vinganca Minha
programme.desc: Aps o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho atravs da fronteira para Vancouver.

programme.title: Possuda
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irm mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma misso desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitio e salv-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo

programme.title: A Cura

programme.title: Jogos Mortais
programme.desc: Um sdico serial killer sequestra aqueles que so moralmente rebeldes e os fora a fazer escolhas impossveis em um jogo de sobrevivncia assustador.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw est de volta. O gnio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A histria se passa quase 15 anos aps os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a nica sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e comea a desenvolver obsesses assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: A Lista (2008)
programme.desc: Um contador levado por seu amigo advogado a uma misteriosa casa de swing chamada The List. Mas nesse novo mundo, ele logo se torna o principal suspeito do desaparecimento de uma mulher e de um roubo multimilionrio.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporo ameaa destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extino.

programme.title: Assassinos do Espao
programme.desc: Em um dia normal, cinco amigos saem para beber noite, mas, coisas estranhas comeam a acontecer. As luzes apagam, os telefones no funcionam e uma invaso de naves aliengenas escurece o cu.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubares
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se v isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles so forados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espcies cada vez mais mortais de tubaro.

programme.title: Hava em Chamas
programme.desc: Quando um supervulco entra em erupo no Hava, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da populao antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Infectados
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Frente a Frente
programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Torturado
programme.desc: Jimmy contratado pelo misterioso chefe do crime Ziggy para obter uma confisso do seu contador por meio de tortura. Mas Jimmy na verdade no quem ele aparenta ser; um agente infiltrado do FBI

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E28

programme.title: Depois de derrotar por pouco o All Starz no Torneio Americano, Kenny decide que ele deve registrar um banco de dados dos pontos altos e baixos dos BladeBreakers desde o incio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E29

programme.title: Viajando de barco pelo Atlntico, os Bladebreakers devem no apenas lidar com o enjoo de Kenny, mas uma revelao devastadora.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E31

programme.title: Depois que seu trem misteriosamente sequestrado, as crianas se encontram nos recessos escuros de um tnel. aqui que os Bladebreakers encontram um grupo de fantasmas zumbis, os Dark Bladers.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E32

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E33

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E34

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Roma, procurando pelo misterioso Enrique. Zombando do desafio de Beyblade, Enrique decide que prefere passar o dia com algumas de suas amigas.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E35

programme.title: No querendo deixar sua derrota inicial para Enrique o perturbar, Tyson fica ocupado refazendo seu Beyblade. Com Enrique duvidando de sua prpria tcnica, e Oliver visitando-o da Frana em Roma, o cenrio est pronto para uma revanche.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E36

programme.title: Enrique e Oliver decidem levar nossos heris em um passeio dirigvel para visitar o castelo de Robert. O motivo - Tyson espera vingar uma perda anterior para Robert que aconteceu a bordo do navio que chegou Europa.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E37

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E40

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers encontram alguns velhos amigos na Rssia quando All Starz e o White Tiger Clan aparecem para uma partida de exibio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E41

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E42

programme.title: o primeiro dia do Beyblade World Championships em Moscou e, quando os Bladebreakers deixam o hotel, eles ainda no conseguiram localizar Kai que est desaparecido h algum tempo.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E43

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E45

programme.title: As finais do campeonato mundial esto prestes a comear e Kai insiste em Beybattling primeiro, esperando que seu conhecimento do Neo Borg lhe d uma vantagem sobre o primeiro lutador do Neo Borg, Serge.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E48

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E49

programme.title: A neve est caindo fora de poca. Mirok sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vo procur-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torn-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salv-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E5

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E6

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E7

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exrcito dos Sete para ving-los. Ele v Sesshomaru e se certifica de que uma iluso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E8

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jia que parece pertencer ao Exrcito, mas a luz no emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom mdico o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E9

programme.title: A personalidade m de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianas o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E10

programme.title: H uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak no pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vo procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E11

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha comea. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E12

programme.title: H uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por nvoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo h cem anos, venerado l. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele no volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E13

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha est fica irritado por ver que seus amigos esto se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E14

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E15

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrs do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exrcito dos Sete est fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E16

programme.title: Suikotsu no pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Aps isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vo para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E17

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permisso. Ao faz-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E18

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei so os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E19

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a mmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E20

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E21

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E22
